orderNumber.description: Customer Order Number associated to shipment

orderSource.description: Source from where the order was received

shipmentDateTime.description: Date time shipment is release to be sent

identifier.description: A unique identifier for the party

guest.description: Identifies for a party buying goods online if they are a Guest or not

code.description: Code to define type of party

identifier.description: Unique Identifier for a given location

address.description: Address of location as defined by address type

firstName.description: First Name of contact at address

lastName.description: Last Name of contact at address

attentionOfName.description: Attention of person who may notbe primary contact at address

countryCode.description: Country code for address as defined in country code enum

countryName.description: Country name for address as defined in countryName enum
enum: Congo, the Democratic Republic of the
Macedonia, the Former Yugoslav Republic of
Saint Helena, Ascension and Tristan da Cunha
South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands

phoneNumber.description: Contact Phone Number and Country Dialing Code Details

emailAddress.description: Party Email address. When unencrypted it will be type ./common-v4 /definitions/email

taxCountryCode.description: Country Code of TAX responsibility for party

taxCountryName.description: Country Name of TAX responsibility for party
enum: Congo, the Democratic Republic of the
Macedonia, the Former Yugoslav Republic of
Saint Helena, Ascension and Tristan da Cunha
South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands

customerAccountNumber.description: This field represents the Farmlands Account Number or BizRewards Account Number or Approved Debtors Number if a customer has used any to place an order

customerAccountType.description: The type of customer account for which the order is placed.

items.description: Unique item identifier of the order line item, mastered from the item producer system

producer.description: List of all the potential producers

releaseLineNumber.description: Release line number assigned by order management system to fulfill order for the order line

orderLineNumber.description: The position of a line item within an order, assigned to the Product Line Item

orderType.description: Classification for the type of order

quantity.description: Number of items to be shipped

dangerous.description: Is the product classified as hazardous

format.description: List of all the potential barcode format

requestedFulfilmentDatetime.description: The date and time when an order line has been requested to be fulfilled by the business customer while placing the sales order.

shipVia.description: How the goods will be delivered

deliveryMethod.description: How the goods will be delivered

signatureRequired.description: Identifies if the delivery needs a signature

packaging.description: How the goods will be packed for delivery
